Description

Welcome to a world where whimsy meets strategy! Sky Fields: Goober Gardens is a unique, cozy creature collector within the world of Sky Fields. Focused upon raising and nurturing Goobers, Sky Fields: Goober Gardens is a tranquil sanctuary for players to breed, feed and raise Goobers. Sky Fields: Goober Gardens boasts an array of biomes providing different environments for Goobers to grow as you progress in the game.

History

Origins

Sky Fields: Goober Gardens began as a passion project, initially developed on a custom-built engine that explored multithreading, procedural generation, and innovative lighting techniques. While early experimentation laid the technical foundation, the project truly took shape upon its move into Unity, where ideas of airships, floating islands, and vast networks of creatures could come to life.

Evolution

From those first prototypes, the vision expanded into a vibrant Monster-Tamer experienc. Over time, the systems evolved—lighting, environments, and gameplay mechanics were rebuilt and refined—shaping Sky Fields: Goober Gardens into an accessible yet ambitious asynchronous multiplayer adventure, designed to bring players to visit islands and explore, trade, and playfully compete.

Features

  • Creature Collector, Monster Tamer, Voxel, Idler

About Lontis, The Developer

Boilerplate
Lontis, The Developer is an independent game studio born from a shared love of gaming and years of experimenting with code. Inspired by classics like RuneScape and LittleBigPlanet, we create imaginative multiplayer experiences that blend creativity, adventure, and community.
